definition: surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: You will see Gypsies begging beside the road, but do not give them any money.
sentences.chinese: 你會看到吉普賽人在路邊乞討，但是不要給他們錢。

sentences.english: I was, though, completely unaware of the outrageous way the media portrays the Gypsy population.
sentences.chinese: 然而我完全不知道媒體對吉普賽人的無恥可惡的描繪。

sentences.english: These will transform your look into a glamorous gypsy style.
sentences.chinese: 這些都會讓你看起來就像迷人的吉普賽人。

sentences.english: Romanies in Europe, like any other ethnic group, are no monolith.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲的吉普賽人與其他族羣一樣也分三六九等。

sentences.english: This week an MEP from Jobbik, a far-right Hungarian party, called for the mass internment of Roma.
sentences.chinese: 本週匈牙利極右黨MEP要求拘捕大批吉普賽人。

sentences.english: Word had it that a band of gypsies had been stealing things in the neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 據說，一夥吉普賽人一直在附近行竊。

sentences.english: Gypsies are also very good dancers; they developed the flamenco.
sentences.chinese: 吉普賽人很擅長舞蹈，弗朗明哥舞就是他們發明的。

sentences.english: Gypsies have endured almost every form of discrimination.
sentences.chinese: 吉普賽人可謂是經歷了各種歧視和磨難。

sentences.english: She was lady, lace and cameo, not the gypsy that is me.
sentences.chinese: 她是個淑女，細膩又華麗，不像有如吉普賽人的我。

sentences.english: The headman of the gypsies, cowed and nervous, was apparently trying to offer explanations.
sentences.chinese: 領頭的吉普賽人顯然被嚇壞了，正在緊張地試圖解釋。

sentences.english: I will tell maria and the gypsy how to handle the horses .
sentences.chinese: 我去告訴瑪麗婭和吉普賽人怎樣侍弄這些馬。

sentences.english: America gives its Romanies that chance.
sentences.chinese: 美國已經給吉普賽人這樣的機會。

sentences.english: Until the European Union expanded eastwards, this was mostly a problem for eastern European countries.
sentences.chinese: 歐盟東擴之前，吉普賽人的問題主要侷限於東歐地區。

sentences.english: More than likely she's some fly-by-night gypsy, out to make a quick buck.
sentences.chinese: 她更像個不可靠的吉普賽人，出來搞點兒快錢。

sentences.english: Were there gipsies in the plantation at the time?
sentences.chinese: 那時吉普賽人在種植園裏嗎？

sentences.english: Many Romanies do not even get that far.
sentences.chinese: 許多吉普賽人甚至連面試的機會都沒有。

definition: Brave New World, novel by Aldous Huxley 阿道司·赫胥黎[A1 dao4 si1 · He4 xu1 li2]
double reed wind instrument (such as oboe or bassoon)
Jean Auguste Dominique Ingres (1780-1867), French Neoclassical painter
